timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	METHOD method_7294 canModifyBlocks ()Z
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_7294 canBreakBlocks ()Z
          
      
    
    
  

unless this is used for interaction checks like axe right click/shovel right click
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -134,7 +134,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1657 net/minecraft/entity/player/PlayerEntity
 		ARG 2 inventory
 	METHOD method_7292 getLuck ()F
 	METHOD method_7293 vanishCursedItems ()V
-	METHOD method_7294 canModifyWorld ()Z
+	METHOD method_7294 canModifyBlocks ()Z

replies.bodyText: It's used for interaction checks where the interaction may modify the block, like inverting a daylight sensor, as well as for block breaking
replies.author: Earthcomputer
